Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    (c) 2012 Bohde Productions Inc. All Rights Reserved. This class creates the main interface used to play the game. It contains the menus and code structure to manage the players money throughout the casino and dealing with switching games, creating games, and quitting games.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Card[] cards
      The cards in this deck.
      static boolean fiveCard
      True if the deck was created by a Five Card Draw table.
      static int NUM_CARDS
      The standard value of cards in a deck: 52.
      static java.lang.String[] SUITS
      The standard 4 suits of a deck of cards: Hearts, Clubs, Spades, and Diamonds

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck(boolean fiveCard)
      Creates a new standard shuffled deck of 52 cards.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card deal()
      Simulates the dealing of a card, then shifts all remaining cards to the beginning of the array.
      void shuffle()
      Shuffles the deck.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • SUITS

        public static final java.lang.String[] SUITS
        The standard 4 suits of a deck of cards: Hearts, Clubs, Spades, and Diamonds

      • NUM_CARDS

        public static final int NUM_CARDS
        The standard value of cards in a deck: 52.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • fiveCard

        public static boolean fiveCard
        True if the deck was created by a Five Card Draw table. Enables the firing of ActionEvents on all cards in the deck.

      • cards

        private Card[] cards
        The cards in this deck.
        See Also:
        NUM_CARDS

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck(boolean fiveCard)
        Creates a new standard shuffled deck of 52 cards.
        Parameters:
        fiveCard - should be true if this deck is being used at a Five Card Draw table. Enables the firing of ActionEvents on all cards in the deck.

    • Method Detail

      • deal

        public Card deal()
        Simulates the dealing of a card, then shifts all remaining cards to the beginning of the array.
        Returns:
        A Card object simulating the dealt card. null will be returned if there are no cards remaining.

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Shuffles the deck. Contains an off-by-one error; the 52nd card will never be shuffled.
